Population estimates for UK, England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland dataset

This is not the latest data. View latest data

Release date:
22 June 2017

Release frequency:
Annual

Next release:
June 2018

Estimates of the usual resident population for the UK as at 30 June of the reference year. Provided by administrative area, single year of age and sex.

Get the data

Filter and download

  • Complete dataset CSV CSV, 22.9MB
  • Complete dataset Excel XLSX, 4.4MB
  • Supporting information TXT, 12.4KB
